subject: Math
title: Day and Night
learningObjectives: Identify common objects seen in the sky during the day (sun) and at night (moon, stars).
Describe typical activities that happen during the day and at night.
Understand that day and night follow a repeating pattern.

content.body: The sun shines during the day. We play and learn during the day.

content.alt: A sun and a moon with stars.

content.body: The moon and stars come out at night. We sleep at night.

questions.question: What do we see in the sky during the day?
What do we usually do at night?

content.body: El sol brilla durante el día. Jugamos y aprendemos durante el día.

questions.question: ¿Qué vemos en el cielo durante el día?
